mapper.select: SELECT ITEM.ITEMID, ITEM.LISTPRICE, ITEM.UNITCOST, ITEM.SUPPLIER AS supplierId, ITEM.PRODUCTID AS "product.productId", PRODUCT.NAME AS "product.name", PRODUCT.DESCN AS "product.description", PRODUCT.CATEGORY AS "product.categoryId", ITEM.STATUS, ITEM.ATTR1 AS attribute1, ITEM.ATTR2 AS attribute2, ITEM.ATTR3 AS attribute3, ITEM.ATTR4 AS attribute4, ITEM.ATTR5 AS attribute5 FROM ITEM, PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT.PRODUCTID = ITEM.PRODUCTID AND ITEM.PRODUCTID = #{value}

SELECT ITEM.ITEMID, ITEM.LISTPRICE, ITEM.UNITCOST, ITEM.SUPPLIER AS supplierId, ITEM.PRODUCTID AS "product.productId", PRODUCT.NAME AS "product.name", PRODUCT.DESCN AS "product.description", PRODUCT.CATEGORY AS "product.categoryId", ITEM.STATUS, ITEM.ATTR1 AS attribute1, ITEM.ATTR2 AS attribute2, ITEM.ATTR3 AS attribute3, ITEM.ATTR4 AS attribute4, ITEM.ATTR5 AS attribute5, INVENTORY.QTY AS quantity FROM ITEM, INVENTORY, PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT.PRODUCTID = ITEM.PRODUCTID AND ITEM.ITEMID = INVENTORY.ITEMID AND ITEM.ITEMID = #{value}
